ae.name: Alter-Ego
ae.description:
In this project, I worked in a start-up which provides a 3D virtual fitting solution to E-commmerce platforms. Given a single full-body image of a shopper and sewing patterns of a garment piece, we presented a 3D avatar with the given cloth fit on the body.

In this project I was responsible for the processing the sewing patterns (DXF files) into 3D garments. This involved
  • Pre-processing the DXF files
  • Defining an internal representation
  • Manipulating the meshes in such a way that they can be sewn together
  • Modelling the sewing of cloth pieces as a mathematical optimization problem
  • Placing the sewn cloth correclty on the avatar and physically simulate it into a 3D garment
Besides the above tasks, I played a significant role in designing and implementing all internal representations, pipelines and infrastructures. Furthermore, I gained experience in deploying applications with AWS and Docker.
